Lyric:
[00:14.000]Is it getting better
[00:19.000]Or do you feel the same
[00:24.000]Will it make it easier on you
[00:29.000]Now you got someone to blame
[00:33.000]You say
[00:34.000]One love
[00:37.000]One life
[00:40.000]When it's one need
[00:42.000]In the night
[00:45.000]It's one love
[00:47.000]We get to share it
[00:50.000]It leaves you baby
[00:53.000]If you don't care for it
[01:07.000]Did I disappoint you?
[01:12.000]Or leave a bad taste in your mouth?
[01:17.000]You act like you never had love
[01:22.000]And you want me to go without
[01:26.000]Well it's too late
[01:30.000]Tonight
[01:33.000]To drag tha past out into the light
[01:38.000]We're one
[01:40.000]But we're not the same
[01:42.000]We get to carry each other
[01:45.000]Carry each other
[01:47.000]One
[02:00.000]Have you come here for forgiveness
[02:05.000]Have you come tor raise the dead
[02:10.000]Havew you come here to play Jesus
[02:15.000]To the lepers in your head
[02:20.000]Did I ask too much
[02:23.000]More than a lot
[02:25.000]You gave me nothing
[02:27.000]Now it's all I got
[02:31.000]We're one
[02:33.000]But we're not the same
[02:35.000]We hurt each other
[02:38.000]Then we do it again
[02:40.000]You say
[02:41.000]Love is a temple
[02:43.000]Love a higher law
[02:46.000]Love is a temple
[02:49.000]Love the higher law
[02:51.000]You ask me to enter
[02:54.000]But then you make me crawl
[02:57.000]And I can't be holding on
[03:01.000]To what you got
[03:03.000]When all you got is hurt
[03:05.000]One love
[03:08.000]One blood
[03:11.000]One life
[03:12.000]You got to do what you should
[03:16.000]One life
[03:19.000]With each other
[03:21.000]Sisters Brothers
[03:27.000]One life
[03:28.000]But we're not the same
[03:31.000]We get to carry each other
[03:34.000]Carry each other
[03:36.000]One life
[03:41.000]One.
